data.actual_result: Entry says "username#1234 deleted 1 MESSAGES by username#1337 in #mycoolte..."
data.expected_result: Latest entry should say "username#1234 deleted A MESSAGE by username#1337 in #mycoolte..."
data.short_description: Discord uses wrong plural argument in Audit Logs for message deletion
data.steps_to_repro: - Delete SIGNLE message by user in any channel - Go to audit log
